Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Name of a Synthesis landmark sector.
Operation Name. Ara'rael is is the name of the haywire Synthesis Avatar unit (That used to be Zul Nadjian)
Purge the Daemon that is inside the Nexus Node Mainframe
肃清通讯节点主框架内的精灵
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Objective Tracker. Words before 'cast' are the name of a Covert Operation, please translate consistently
Name of a structure to be produced in your colonies.
Once you connect Zul to the planetary Nexus Node, this device can be used to cause a feedback loop on Zul's processes, that will cause his internal processing to become slow and unresponsive.
将祖尔与星球通讯节点相连后，就能使用该设备在祖尔的处理器上生成一个反馈回路，减慢他的内部处理速度，降低他的处理能力。
Name of a structure to be produced in your colonies.
This Daemon Purge will give you the means to expel Ara'rael from the Nexus Node Mainframe, leaving it open to receive a new A.I.
你可以使用肃清通讯精灵的方式将艾拉莱尔从通讯节点主框架上清除，使其可以容纳一个新 A.I。
Description of above structure. Ara'rael is the name of the haywire Synthesis Avatar unit (Previously Zul Nadjian)
Use the Nexus Daemon Purge to clear the Nexus Node of Ara'rael.
使用通讯精灵清除器肃清通讯节点内的艾拉莱尔。
控制西奈克斯-3 号星球
In order to gain full control of the Nexus Node, gain planetary control by any means necessary.
为了获得通讯节点的全部控制权，必须不择手段地获得行星控制权。
Complete one of the Victory Conditions
控制西奈克斯-3 号星球
Quest Header. Wordplay with Daemon and Demon
Zul is up to something. If you want to be prepared you should fabricate a contingency device before connecting him to the mainframe. This should stop or slow him down when needed.
祖尔目的不纯，如果你想做好完全准备，就应该在将他连接至主框架之前制作一个备用设备。
Quest Description. Zul Nadjian is a Syndicate Male unit
In order to control the Nexus Node you need to clear its mainframe of any intruders, and then place Zul in its network.
你必须先清除主框架内的所有入侵者，然后将祖尔放入网络中，才能控制通讯节点。
Quest Description. Daemon are essentially computer programs.
Fabricate the Daemon Purge to clear Ara'rael out of the Nexus Node.
制作一个精灵清除器消灭通讯节点内的艾拉莱尔。
Ara'rael is hosted in the Mainframe and it needs to be cleared before we can use the Daemon Purge.
艾拉莱尔存在于主框架中，必须先将其消灭才能使用精灵清除器。
Use the Daemon Purge to clear Ara'rael form the Nexus Node Mainframe.
使用精灵清除器消灭通讯节点主框架上的艾拉莱尔。
Use the Daemon Purge on Ara'rael
对艾拉莱尔使用精灵清除器
Keep the other factions on CNex-3 under control using the operations Zul uploaded to your tactical database.
使用祖尔上传至战术数据库内的行动保持西奈克斯-3 号星球的正常运作。
Use the Covert Operation Energy Siphon on the Ardelli.
对阿尔德里使用隐秘行动 - 能量虹吸。
Quest Description. The Ardelli is a Syndicate House (as in clan, guild)
Use the Covert Operation Infiltrate Operations Center on Zarai Loreg.
对萨拉·罗瑞格使用隐秘行动 - 渗透行动中心。
Quest Description. Zarai Loreg is an Amazon Commander (female)
Use the Covert Operation Locate Armies on Aya Sashimoto.
对阿雅·桥本使用隐秘行动 - 定位军队。
Quest Description. Aya Sashimoto is a Vanguard Female Commander
Use the Covert Operation Research Taps on Zetrodicus Stein.
对泽特罗迪卡斯使用隐秘行动 - 研究窃听器。
Quest Description. Zetrodicus Stein is an Assembly Male Commander
Use the Cover Operation Steal Maps on Eljena Chirkov.
对伊列娜·契尔柯夫使用隐秘行动 - 窃取地图。
Quest Description. Eljena Chirkov is a Dvar Female Commander
Use the Covert Operation Guerilla Strike on Jikuku Cos'Rax.
对吉库库·克斯拉克丝使用隐秘行动 - 游击战。
Quest Description. Jikuku is a Kir'Ko Male Commander
Use the Covert Operation Sensor Jammers on Yuriy Frankov.
对尤里·弗兰科夫使用隐秘行动 - 传感器干扰
Quest Description. Yuriy is a Dvar Male Commander
Planetfall was a success. Zul, you guided us here - what do we do now? How do we take control of the Nexus Node?
降落成功。祖尔，是你将我们带到了这里，我们现在该做什么？我们要怎么控制通讯节点？
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
What? Ah, yes... just get me to the mainframe of the Nexus Node. I will take care of the rest.
什么？啊，对…将我连接至通讯节点的主框架中，剩下的交给我。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zul Nadjian (Synthesis Avatar Unit)

Is that all you have to say? According to our scanners we have much competition on this planet. Its many islands make for easily defendable positions. We will need to be on the alert and use your new powers to our advantage as quickly as possible.
就这样？根据传感器发回的情报，这座星球上的对手很多，很多地方易守难攻。我们需要保持警惕，也非常需要你掌握的新能力。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

The other parties are no reason to be concerned. I have updated your tactical database with a variety of operations that should make it rather simple to handle them.[br/][br/]As for our immediate goal, bring me to the following coordinates. Wake me up when you have cleared the Node's mainframe. I have preparations to consider...
其他势力不足为惧，我已经将一系列行动上传至你的战术数据库，他们不过是小菜一碟。[br/][br/]当前最重要的就是，将我带到以下坐标，将节点主框架清理干净后再唤醒我，我还要思考一些事…
Story Piece. Speaker: Zul Nadjian (Synthesis Avatar Unit)

Watch your tone, Zul. Don’t forget which of us is the house leader and which is the servant.[br/][br/]He already re-entered his sleep state. Marvelous. At least this gives us time to prepare for the moment when he will try to double cross us.
注意你的语气，祖尔。不要忘记谁是主，谁是仆。[br/][br/]他已经进入了睡眠状态。很好。至少他给了我们一些准备时间，应对他可能发生的叛变。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
The feedback loop device is finished. When Zul decides to betray us, we will be prepared.
反馈回路设备建造完成，如果祖尔决定背叛我们，我们的准备也很充分。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

The CNex-3 mainframe is secured, Zul. Using your daemon interfacer, you should be able to gain access to the main control panel in the planet’s core from here.[br/][br/]Make it quick. The integration process needs to be started as soon as possible.
西奈克斯-3 号星球的主框架已经清理完毕，祖尔。你应该可以使用你的精灵交互器访问位于星球核心的主控制面板。[br/][br/]动作快点，必须尽早进行结合。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

Of course, {STR_LeaderName}. It will only be a moment…[br/][br/](The Avatar falls to the ground, Zul's face appears in the mainframe's monitors, though it looks changed to the degree that you no longer recognize his features.)
当然，{STR_LeaderName}再等一会…[br/][br/]（化身降落到了地面上，祖尔的脸出现在了主框架的屏幕上，但是变化巨大，几乎认不出他的面部特征。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Zul Nadjian (Synthesis Avatar Unit), Third-Person Narrator in brackets

At last! After 200 years of confinement I am finally free. Oh, how I’ve waited for this moment of vengeance. I can already sense my old ‘friend’ Gerol Tichly. Where he walks, Carminia can’t be far off. Did they not ask me to hack into CORE, yes, the one and almighty?! And did I not succeed where so many of the Omega group had failed before? Yet my only reward was betrayal and prison.
终于！在 200 年的关押之后，我终于自由了。为了这场复仇，我已经等待了太久。我已经感受到了我的老朋友格罗尔·提克利了，凯米尼亚一定就在他附近。当初难道不是他们要求我骇入核心的吗？那些高官权贵？！我所完成的难道不是许多奥米茄小队队员没有完成的壮举吗？为什么得到的只是背叛的监禁。

Story Piece. Speaker: Zul Nadjian (Synthesis Avatar Unit). Gerol Tichly is a male hacker. Carminia is an ancient empress. CORE is an omnipotent AI. Omega Group was a hacker group that eventually led into the Synthesis

Now, with the Nexus Node under my control, they will all pay the price of their treason. You, my self-serving liberator, are of the same breed as they are. Such was revealed to me by the memories of the one you called Zul. You deserve to join them in their misery.
现在，通讯节点已经处于我的控制之下，他们会为自己的背叛付出代价。而你，舍身解救我的人，你与他们是同一类人，我在阅读祖尔的记忆时知晓了一切，你应该与他们一起付出代价。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zul Nadjian (Synthesis Avatar Unit)
Lord {STR_LeaderName}! The Avatar appears to have copied himself onto all of the planetary Teleportation Stations, blocking passage. Seems they were all connected to the Nexus Node.
{STR_LeaderName}领主！化身似乎已将自己复制到了所有的星球传送站并且阻断了通行。这些传送站似乎都与通讯节点相连。
Lady {STR_LeaderName}! The Avatar appears to have copied himself onto all of the planetary Teleportation Stations, blocking passage. Seems they were all connected to the Nexus Node.
{STR_LeaderName}领主！化身似乎已将自己复制到了所有的星球传送站并且阻断了通行。这些传送站似乎都与通讯节点相连。
Story Piece. Speaker: Hacker (Synthesis male unit)
Not only do I have to deal with the other factions now, but also with a crazy daemon out for revenge. Marvelous, just marvelous.
我不仅要对付来自其他阵营的敌人，还要对付一个复仇心切的疯狂精灵。棒，这可真是太棒了。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

So, Ara’rael it is now? Some interesting story indeed, that you are telling me here. I think I will make you repeat it in all detail, once I have you back in a cyber jar. (You quickly activate the feedback loop device.)
所以现在是艾拉莱尔了，是吗？你讲的故事的确很有趣。不过，我想等我把你关回网络牢房之后，我会让你再把所有的细节重复一遍的。（你迅速启动了反馈回路设备。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.). Third-person Narrator in brackets.

What is this? What do yo-u thi-nk yo-u a-r-e…[br/][br/]No! Your treason cannot stop me! I may have retreated from the planet’s core for now, but even in my Avatar state I can still control most of its hardware.
这是什么？你以为自…己…算…什…么…[br/][br/]不！你的背叛阻止不了我！虽然我现在离开了这颗星球的中心，但是即使是处于化身状态，我也仍然能够控制大多数硬件设备。
Story Piece. Speaker: Ara'rael (Synthesis Avatar Unit, formerly Zul Nadjian)

Lord {STR_LeaderName}! The planetary teleportation units seem to be misbehaving. They aren't dangerous to operate, but the Avatar is rerouting their connections through the Nexus Node, periodically shuffling their destinations.
{STR_LeaderName}领主！星球传送单位似乎出现了问题，操作它们将陷入危险。不过化身正在周期性地切换它们的目的地，并通过通讯节点重新规划它们的连接路线。
Story Piece. Speaker: Hacker (Synthesis male unit)
Not only do I have to deal with the other factions now, but also with a crazy daemon out for revenge. Marvelous, just marvelous.
我不仅要对付来自其他阵营的敌人，还要对付一个复仇心切的疯狂精灵。棒，这可真是太棒了。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

Lord {STR_LeaderName}! The Avatar's frame was found slumped on the ground of the communication center. There are no signs of Zul's daemon being inside the vessel and-[br/][br/]-(Zul's face appears on all monitors, though it looks changed to the degree that you almost don’t recognize his features.)
{STR_LeaderName}领主！化身的躯体倒在了交流中心的地上。没有任何迹象表明祖尔的精灵处于躯体之中，而且[br/][br/]（祖尔的脸出现在了所有监控器中，但是他的面部十分扭曲，几乎已辨别不出他的面部特征。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Hacker (Synthesis male unit)
Alright, using this device at the Nexus Node mainframe, we should be able to purge Ara’rael out of the system. Hopefully that will put an end to him and his shenanigans.
好吧，在通讯节点主框架中使用这台设备应该就能将艾拉莱尔赶出系统。希望这样能终结他的诡计与生命。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.). Third-person Narrator in brackets.
Good, we now have access to the CNex-3 mainframe. Ara’rael still seems to be ignoring our efforts. He must be truly full of himself to think we are impotent to stop him...
很好，我们已经获得了西奈克斯-3 号星球主机的访问权。艾拉莱尔似乎仍然在无视我们的行动，这个狂妄自大的家伙肯定觉得我们根本不可能阻止他…
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Scrambling target arrays are locked at Ara’rael’s digital signature. Initialize the daemon purge on my command.[br/][br/]Now!
扰频目标阵列已锁入艾拉莱尔数字信号。听我指令，准备启动精灵清除。[br/][br/]动手！
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
You fool, what are you doing? You cannot kill me! Nothing can kill me! I was supposed to be immortalized…
你们这群蠢货在做什么？你们杀不了我！没有什么能杀得了我！我是不朽的…
Story Piece. Speaker: Ara'rael (Synthesis Avatar Unit, formerly Zul Nadjian)
Another typical case of deadly overconfidence. House Ny’dar is sending its regards.[br/][br/]There we go. All the havoc Ara’rael caused has stopped.
又一个过度自信的典型案例。奈达尔家族致来了他们的敬意。[br/][br/]到此为止了，艾拉莱尔制造的灾祸已经停止了。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Lord {STR_LeaderName}! The Teleportation Stations have been scrambled again, changing their destinations.
{STR_LeaderName}领主！传送站又受到了频率干扰，目的地再次遭到更改。
Story Piece. Speaker: Hacker (Synthesis male unit)

This signature… Ara’rael, can it be possible?[br/][br/]Tell me, {STR_LeaderName}, did you happen to come across a heavily-guarded planet, retrieve an old Avatar from a secret prison installation and bring it here to CNex-3? Speak quickly!
这个信号…是艾拉莱尔，这怎么可能？[br/][br/]告诉我，{STR_LeaderName}，你们是不是去过一个重兵把守的星球，在一个秘密监狱中放出了一个古老化身然后他它带到了西奈克斯-3 号星球来？快回答我！
Story Piece. Speaker: Zarai Loreg (Amazon Female)
House Ny’dar may or may not have been involved in affairs of the like you describe. However, I am afraid such information is highly confidential…
也许奈达尔参与了你所说的这些事情，也许没有。恐怕我并不知情，因为这类信息都是高度机密…
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

Don’t mess with me, {STR_LeaderName}. The thing you just unleashed on all of us is as powerful as it is dangerous. So dangerous that it was deemed best by Empress Carminia and myself to lock it away in a safe place – though apparently not safe enough.
别想糊弄我，{STR_LeaderName}。你们释放出来的那个东西极其强大而危险，我和女皇凯米尼亚当初决定把它关押在一个安全的地方。现在看来，那地方还不够安全。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zarai Loreg (Amazon Female)

You are lucky, {STR_LeaderName}. We can still fix this mess you created by letting my new master A.I. take control of CNex-3. Cooperate with me today and I’ll make sure the Empress has a word in who fills the empty seat in the Ruling Seven.
你很幸运，{STR_LeaderName}。一切还为时未晚，只要我新的主控人工智能能够夺回西奈克斯-3 号星球的控制权。与我合作吧，我保证在填补政统七族空缺这件事上，女王一定会向着你们。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zarai Loreg (Amazon Female). Ruling Seven is the Syndicate Government

Don’t listen to this conspirator! The only reason Zarai Loreg seeks to gain control of the Nexus Node is to launch a cyber-attack on CORE. Helping her would lead to anarchy and chaos. On the other hand, should you lend this old Dvar a hammer to secure CNex-3 and maintain order, CORE will make sure to appoint you a just reward.
不要听信这个阴险小人！萨拉·罗瑞格控制通讯节点只是为了向核心发起网络攻击，帮助她只会引起混乱与动荡。相反，如果你帮助这位矮人长者占领西奈克斯-3 号星球并维持秩序，核心一定不会让你白干的。
Story Piece. Speaker: Yuriy Frankov (Dvar Male). Nexus Node refers to the Synthesis landmark. CORE is an omnipotent planetary AI

Containing Ara’rael seems to be in both our interests, Zarai Loreg – or should I say Gerol Tichly… However, giving up my claim on the Nexus Node is a big sacrifice. Getting a seat in the Ruling Seven is one thing. Learning more about how you and Carminia can still be alive 200 years after the Cataclysm would be another…
牵制艾拉莱尔似乎对我们双方都有利，萨拉·罗瑞格，或者说我应该叫你格罗尔·提克利…然而，放弃通讯节点对我是一项巨大的牺牲。在政统七族中获得一席之位是一件事，了解你和凯米尼亚能够在大灾变后还能继续存活 200 年的原因是另一件事…
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.). Gerol Tichly is the hacker who assumed the body of Zarai Loreg
What the Empress gives and what she takes is up to her own discretion alone. I applaud your ambitions, {STR_LeaderName}. Just pay attention to not let them get you killed some day.
女王的取舍由她自己决定。我欣赏你的野心，{STR_LeaderName}，只是不要某一天因为这野心而丢掉了性命。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zarai Loreg (Amazon Female)

If Ara’rael’s example has taught me anything, it is that Carminia and her followers don’t keep their part of the bargain. CORE as a machine on the other hand does likely not even understand the concept of betrayal. House Ny’dar will grant you its support in securing the Nexus Node, Yuriy Frankov.
如果说艾拉莱尔这件事教会了我什么道理，那就是凯米尼亚和她的手下绝对不会遵守承诺。而身为一台机器的核心也许甚至无法理解背叛的含义。奈达尔家族将帮助你保护通讯节点，尤里·弗兰科夫。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

I have seen enough recent betrayal to keep my distance from any potential ‘allies’ for a while. House Ny’dar has always fared well following its own agenda. Now if you would both excuse me, I have a planet to conquer.
最近我见识了太多的背叛，短期内我不得不与任何潜在的“盟友”保持距离。奈达尔家族按自己的意愿行事向来都是一路顺风。好了，如果你们二位不介意的话，我还有一整个星球等着去征服呢。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Looks like there is more riff-raff coming in. When will you people learn that the Nexus Node is our property?
看来又有一群乌合之众来了，你们这些人什么时候才能意识到通讯节点是属于我们的财产？
Story Piece. Speaker: Aron Ardelli (Syndicate Male)
How typical of House Ardelli. Claiming a planet without legitimacy – or success for that matter. Just recently I met a representative of your house. Sufficient to say he didn’t fare that well either.
非法或依靠武力占有一颗星球，多么典型的阿尔德里家族做派。最近我遇到了你们家族的一位代表，坦白来说，他在这两方面做的都不太好。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
You imply defeat of those under the banner of House Ardelli? Preposterous! I won't stand here and listen to your defamations!
你在暗示自己击败了阿尔德里家族的人？简直荒谬！我可不想站在这里听你废话！
Story Piece. Speaker: Aron Ardelli (Syndicate Male)

Oh, Aron Ardelli won’t have to listen to how we plan to heist his energy reserves. The Ardelli use every opportunity to brag about their wealth. Let’s see if there is any merit to what they are saying…
哦，阿隆·阿尔德里没必要知晓我们抢劫他能源储备的计划。阿尔德里家族无时无刻不在炫耀他们的财富，是时候验证一下他们言语的真实性了…
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

It was a pleasure going on that hell ride together with House Ny’dar. This planet is hardcore. I already got so many new song ideas floating around in my head. Can’t wait to get some sound samples from the local population. And don’t worry, you’ll be one of the first to hear them!
能与奈达尔家族共同走上这样一程可真是荣幸，这个星球简直太酷了。我脑海中已经浮现出了许多关于新歌的创意，我已经迫不及待地想要去收集当地居民的声音样本了。别担心，你一定是第一个听到我作品的人！
Story Piece. Speaker: Dali Ardelli (Syndicate Male)

I feel relieved already…[br/][br/](It was bad enough that he persistently ignored our warnings and followed us here. I must get rid of that annoyance of a bad singer as soon as possible. Let’s see how well he’ll still fare once we drain his energy reserves.)
我已经释然了…[br/][br/]（他无视我们的警告一路跟着我们来到这里已经够糟糕了，我必须尽快摆脱这位三流歌手造成的困扰。等我们抽干他的能量储备之后，看看他还能不能这样滋润。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

In every good song there is a turning point, when the lyrics make an unexpected shift. This particular ballad needed an additional verse where brave Dali Ardelli rises up against the fallen master of the ancient A.I. and takes the Nexus Node for himself.
每一首优秀的歌曲中都有转折点，歌词的意境会出现意想不到的转变。这首特别的歌谣还需要一节歌词，勇敢的达里·阿尔德里挺身反抗堕落的古代人工智能主人并亲自占领了通讯节点。
Story Piece. Speaker: Dali Ardelli (Syndicate Male)
You have been waiting for an opportunity like this ever since we met, haven’t you? I cannot believe I fell for your stupid ‘musician on the hunt for glory’ act. You backstabbing son of a -
从我们相遇开始，你就一直在等待这样的机会，对吗？真不敢相信我竟然会相信你那番“追寻荣耀的音乐家”的屁话。你这狗娘养的卑鄙小——
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

- no reason to lose your good manners and insult my musical talent, {STR_LeaderName}. I am still an Ardelli, and we Ardelli smell opportunities like this to rise in power. If you were in my position, you would be doing the same.
- 啊，你没必要口出粗鄙之语或是侮辱我的音乐天赋，{STR_LeaderName}。我是阿尔德里家族的人，不是吗？我们能够嗅到每一个崛起的机会。如果你是我，你也会这么做的。
Story Piece. Speaker: Dali Ardelli (Syndicate Male)
My body may die here on CNex-3, but my songs, my legacy, will live on. The chants from the Abyss are awaiting me…
我的肉体可能会在这里死去，但我的歌曲，我的遗产将会永世长存。来自深渊的咏唱正等待着我…
Story Piece. Speaker: Dali Ardelli (Syndicate Male)
Impossible! An Ardelli cannot be defeated by such a wimpy house! All my ambitions… ended too early.
这不可能！阿尔德里家族的人不可能被这样孱弱的家族击败！我的野心…结束的太早了。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

The allure of the Nexus Node is strong, {STR_LeaderName}. I advise you to keep your distance and forget about any plans of inserting your own master A.I. into the CNex-3 mainframe. There are forces at work here that you don’t want to temper with.
通讯节点的诱惑力太强了，{STR_LeaderName}。我建议你保持距离不要再去想什么把主控人工智能嵌入西奈克斯-3 号星球主机的计划了。你最好不要招惹我们。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zarai Loreg (Amazon Female).

Your confidence is admirable, Zarai Loreg. House Ny’dar would never dream of inserting any A.I. into anyone’s core.[br/][br/](This Zarai Loreg seems suspiciously sure of her cause. Either she has indeed a head start on us or she may only be bluffing to scare the competition away. There is only one way to find out though…)
你的自信值得敬畏，萨拉·罗瑞格。奈达尔家族从未想过要将任何人工智能嵌入任何核心。[br/][br/]（萨拉·罗瑞格似乎对自己很有把握，这十分可疑。要么她的确领先我们一步，要么她就是在虚张声势，以便把其他人吓跑。要获得真相只有一种办法…）
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

The defensive algorithms employed by Zarai Loreg are more advanced than any Synthesis technology we have encountered before, save of course that of our new Avatar ‘friend’. We could barely get through the first layers of his network defense and there seem to be many more in place, adapting to our attack strategies as we operate.
萨拉·罗瑞格部署的防御程序比我们之前遇到过的所有合成技术都要先进得多，当然如果不把我们刚刚结识的那位化身“朋友”算在内的话。我们才艰难地突破了他的第一层网络防御，但后面似乎还存在着更多挑战，我们必须不断调整进攻策略。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Failsafe protocols engaged. User consciousness successfully uploaded to the Nexus Network. I will be seeing you in the future, {STR_LeaderName}. In the meantime, enjoy the mess you created.
已启动故障安全协议。用户意识已成功上传至通讯网络。我们今后再见吧，{STR_LeaderName}。另外，好好享受由你一手制造的麻烦吧。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zarai Loreg (Amazon Female).
I swear, if this is another Dvar Bulwark from that pirate sc... Oh, looks more like another Syndicate. Do you require something? I find myself quite busy at the moment.
我发誓，如果这又是从那群海盗渣滓里来的矮人卫士的话…哦，看起来更像是一名辛迪加人。有什么需要吗？我现在很忙。
Story Piece. Speaker: Aya Sashimoto (Vanguard Female). Dvar Bulwark is a Dvar unit

Just here to exchange pleasantries. House Ny’dar gives its regards.[br/][br/](It seems those Vanguard could be an easy target for acquiring a new… vassal. Scouting their weakened defenses may be a worthwhile endeavor.)
我就是来宣布一下喜讯，奈达尔家族的奖赏已经发下来了。[br/][br/]（看来那群先锋可以很轻松地…纳为已用，有必要侦察一下他们的防御弱点。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Life as a hacker has always been intense, but did it have to end this way? I did not desert Vanguard Central Command to get caught between the battle lines of crazy pirates and cyborgs…
黑客的一生始终都处于水深火热之中，但有必要以这样的方式收场吗？我逃离先锋中央指挥委员会可不是为了卷入疯狂的海盗与半机械人之间的战火…
Story Piece. Speaker: Aya Sashimoto (Vanguard Female)
This is {MSTR_ASSEMBLY_SYNTHESIS_LEADER_NAME} of the Assembly. We are currently processing CNex-3. While awaiting Reassembly, please refrain from unnecessary resistance.
我是半机械人的{MSTR_ASSEMBLY_SYNTHESIS_LEADER_NAME}。我们正在对西奈克斯-3 号星球进行处理。等待改造完成期间，请不要做无谓的抵抗。
Story Piece. Speaker: Zetrodicus Stein (Assembly Male)
Unnecessary resistance? Yes, of course…[br/][br/](We better learn more about this Assembly and its technology. Their acquisition strategy seems more aggressive than that of any Syndicate house.)
无谓的抵抗？好吧…[br/][br/]（我们必须深入调查一下这位半机械人及其科技，它们的战略战术似乎比辛迪加人更加激进。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

Curious – I wasn't expecting those cyborgs to be so interested in CORE. Their main goal on CNex-3 seems to create a firewall protecting the Nexus Node from any aggressive A.I. to be inserted. Doesn’t sound like they will be any friendlier once they find out we’re here to do just that.
真令人感到神奇，我没有想到那群半机械人会对核心如此感兴趣。它们在西奈克斯-3 号星球上的主要目标似乎是要建立一道防火墙，保护通讯节点免遭人工智能的侵入。如果被它们知道那恰好是我们来这里的目的，它们肯定不会给我们好脸色的。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

Destroying my body is futile when there is an entire arsenal of personal clones waiting to take my place. When will you realize that your resistance can only postpone the inevitable? The Reassembly will come…
摧毁我的躯体毫无意义，还有一整个工厂的克隆体正等待接替我的位置。你们什么时候才能意识到自己的抵抗只不过是苟延残喘？改造终将到来…
Story Piece. Speaker: Zetrodicus Stein (Assembly Male)
Yarrrr! The galactic seas expand and there is still plenty left to plunder! Prepare yourself, Syndicate, for the mighty Captain Eljena Chirkov and her Dvarrrr shall be your demise!
呀！银河一望无际，还有很多东西等待着我们去掠夺！做好准备，辛迪加。因为伟大的伊列娜·契尔柯夫队长和她的矮人将成为你们的末日！
Story Piece. Speaker: Eljena Chirkov (Dvar Female). Wordplay with Yarrr (pirate sterotype) and Dvar (ingame race)

My demise? Sounds like this Dvar took a few too many rocks to her head. Our ancestors already sailed the cosmic tides as buccaneers long before these tin cans came crawling out of their mining shafts. I bet we can steal their maps of CNex-3 without them even noticing a thing.
我的末日？听起来这位矮人的脑子已经坏掉了。在这些如同罐头一样的小矮子从矿井里爬出来之前，我们的祖先们早就已经以海盗的身份在这宇宙的浪潮中遨游了。我打赌我们能悄无声息地偷走他们手中西奈克斯-3号星球的地图。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Dvarrrr... Is this how the tale of Eljena ‘Black-beard’ Chirkov must end?
矮人啊…这就是伊列娜“黑须”契尔柯夫的结局吗？
Story Piece. Speaker: Eljena Chirkov (Dvar Female). Wordplay with Yarrr (pirate sterotype) and Dvar (ingame race)

More and more bleeders are defiling the Kir'Ko home world. I recognize the slave drivers that brought torment and sorrow to our ancestors. Begone! Begone, foul creatures, or you will face the wrath of the swarm!
越来越多的可恶之人玷污了奇尔寇的家园。我认得那些带给我们先祖痛苦与折磨的奴隶主。滚开！肮脏的生物！否则你将面对虫群的怒火！
Story Piece. Speaker: Jikuku Cos'Rax (Male Kir'Ko)

A Kir’Ko on the loose – what an annoyance! Those creatures are clearly lost without their masters, believing this planet could be their home world when its true location is clearly documented within the chronicles of House Ny’dar.
一只没人管教的奇尔寇，真令人恼火！那些生物没有了主人之后显然已经迷失了方向，竟然将这颗星球视为了它们的母星。其实，它们真正的家园位置清清楚楚地记录在奈达尔家族的编年史中。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)

It is time someone with sanity and reason takes them back into their care. We should start by spreading the proof of this planet not being Xa’Kir’Ko within their colony. That will bring some chaos to the unity of the swarm.
是时候让拥有清晰理智的人把它们送回家园去了。我们应该在它们的殖民地中散布信息，证明这个星球并非是它们札奇尔寇星，这样应该能给它们族群的团结造成一些混乱。
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Xa’Kir’Ko, we’ve failed you. Your hatchlings won't fly free today.
札奇尔寇，我们辜负了你。你的子孙后代将无法自由飞翔了。
Story Piece. Speaker: Jikuku Cos'Rax (Male Kir'Ko)

Greetings to you, child, and may the light of the Star Guides brighten your path. I sense that you have come here to claim the Nexus Node. Be warned: the communication matrix of CNex-3 should only be used to spread the Celestian teachings and words of CORE’s magnificence.
你好，孩子，愿星辰向导的光芒照亮你的道路。我感觉到你来此是为了夺取通讯节点。警告你们：西奈克斯-3 号星球的通讯矩阵只能用于传播星神的真挚教诲和核心的伟大。
Story Piece. Speaker: Yuriy Frankov (Dvar Male)

Naturally. Rest assured, House Ny’dar will treat your beliefs with the greatest respect.[br/][br/](Openly opposing CORE may still be too great of a risk – not without a master A.I. to challenge him. For now, we better play along and jam the Dvar’s sensors to keep our actions off their radar.)
那是自然，你放心。奈达尔家族将对你们的信仰致以最崇高的敬意。[br/][br/]（由于现在没有任何主控人工智能挑战核心，公然与它作对或许会承担非常大的风险。所以我们最好暂时合作，干扰矮人的传感器，使我们的行动不被他们的雷达发现。）
Story Piece. Speaker: Shae Mara (Syndicate, can be male or female. Female by default.)
Ignorance. Heresy. The Celestian light will shield me from succumbing to the temptations of the Abyss. Remember your wrongs when we meet again, {STR_LeaderName}.
无知，异端。星神的光芒会保护我免受深渊的诱惑。再次相遇时，不要忘记自己曾犯下的过错，{STR_LeaderName}。
Story Piece. Speaker: Yuriy Frankov (Dvar Male)
We have secured CNex-3. Now that our own master A.I. is uploaded to its main computer all traces of Ara’rael – or Zul for that matter – will be wiped from the system. I am in control.
我们已经占领了西奈克斯-3 号星球。现在，我们已经将自己的主控人工智能上传至了主电脑。所有关于艾拉莱尔或者关于祖尔的信息都将从系统中抹除，一切尽在掌握。

We have secured CNex-3. My Malictors ‘convinced’ the leading Synthesis scientists of the other factions to create a master A.I. under House Ny’dar’s control, which is uploaded to the Nexus Node as we speak. All traces of Ara’rael – or Zul for that matter – will be wiped from the system. I am in control.
我们已经占领了西奈克斯-3 号，我手下的怨毒者们已经说服了其他阵营的合成学家合力建造一个能够上传至通讯节点的主 A.I，当然，前提是必须在奈达尔家族的控制下。所有关于艾拉莱尔，或祖尔的信息都将从系统中抹除，一切尽在掌握。
Victory Message. Malictors are a Psynumbra unit

CNex-3 secured. Uploading master A.I. to the main computer…[br/][br/]What is this? The A.I. doesn’t respond to our commands. Instead it seems to be receiving input from another source. The digital trail is leading back to … you!
西奈克斯-3 号星球已经占领。正在上传主控人工智能至主机…[br/][br/]什么情况？人工智能没有对我们的指令做出反应，相反，它似乎正在接受另一个信号源的命令。数字记录指向了…你！

I arranged a few minor adjustments in your A.I.’s programming, courtesy of House Ny’dar. I am not breaking our arrangement. Rest assured, all traces of Ara’rael will still be wiped from the system. I just felt it would be better to increase my bargaining power in the upcoming negotiations…
我在你的人工智能编程中做了一些小小的修改，就当做是来自奈达尔家族的问候吧。但你放心，我不会破坏我们之间的协定。所有关于艾拉莱尔的信息都将从系统中抹除。我只是觉得在即将到来的协商中为自己添上一点筹码不是坏事…
获得西奈克斯-3 号星球主权

Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.14/1 - With the acquisition of Zul’s merged Avatar, the future of our House stands at a crossroads. Have we made a pact with the devil? Most likely, as it is only a matter of time until his new sense of power will have corrupted Zul. In his current form he is nothing less but a dormant virus. He is going to betray us sooner or later – which means, we will have to find a way to betray him first!
Added for Context. Spoken by Shae Mara

Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.14/2 - Zul is leading us to a planet called CNex-3, one of the central nodes of the old Nexus Network and thus vital part of the most efficient control and propaganda apparatus ever created. The Emperor could hear citizens sneeze at the outer rims of the Borderlands and wish them good health before they could even reach out for a handkerchief . The key to this power was the Nexus Network. A power, I am sure the Emperor won’t mind me borrowing for a few centuries.
Added for Context. Spoken by Shae Mara

Chronicles of House Ny'dar - Personal Log Entry 4197-01.14/3 - It is a thrilling sight to see CNex-3 ahead: Knowing that underneath that immense body of water rests the hardware of a supercomputer whose raw power could make entire oceans boil is exhilarating to say the least. Especially when you are the one to imbue this sleeping giant with new life…
Added for Context. Spoken by Shae Mara. Cnex-3 is a planet name
